@apaszke I wanted to load weights from an external source. The ways that would have worked with Variable or Tensor (Tensor.new returns a Tensor, so tensor now breaks the contract :)) didn't work. If there's a completely different way to accomplish this task commonly for Variable, Tensor, Parameter (sth like copy_(resize = True)? but Parameter was also complaining that it's impossible to resize a variable requiring a grad even though this happened before any grad computation), that would work as well.

Parameter.type_as returning a Variable was also a surprise...

@apaszke I wanted to load weights from an external source. The ways that would have worked with Variable or Tensor (Tensor.new returns a Tensor, so tensor now breaks the contract :)) didn't work. If there's a completely different way to accomplish this task commonly for Variable, Tensor, Parameter (sth like `copy_(resize = True)`? but Parameter was also complaining that it's impossible to resize a variable requiring a grad even though this happened before any grad computation), that would work as well.

Parameter.type_as returning a Variable was also a surprise...
